title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the pet health monitoring assistant, including features, functionality, user interface design considerations, target users, integration points with other systems (if any), performance requirements, security considerations, and data privacy guidelines. Collaborate with team members to ensure all aspects are addressed.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline
description: Build the pipeline for collecting and processing pet health and behavior data from various sources.

title: Implement AI Models for Health and Behavior Analysis
description: Develop and train AI models for analyzing pet health and behavior data.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create the user interface for the pet health monitoring assistant, including dashboards and notifications.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Set up the database and data management system for storing and retrieving pet health and behavior data.

title: Establish Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the application.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline
Implement AI Models for Health and Behavior Analysis

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the pet health monitoring assistant.
